data.title: Mrs Beattys recipe for success
data.meta_description: Annette Bening found fame as the woman who brought Warren Beatty to heel. He was then, at 53, Hollywood’s most renowned bachelor, with a liking for extrovert, glamorous women. She was a
data.text:
Annette Bening found fame as the woman who brought Warren Beatty to heel. He was then, at 53, Hollywood’s most renowned bachelor, with a liking for extrovert, glamorous women. She was a thirtysomething Kansas-born divorcée: pretty but plainly dressed, jewellery-free and low-key. When he proposed marriage and they had a child, the Hollywood-watchers snorted with derision and waited for the fallout. The fact that they are still together 12 years later, with four children, has taken the cynics by surprise. But even more surprising is how Bening’s career has soared while Beatty’s has stalled.

Despite long lay-offs to have her family, the 46-year-old actress has delivered a succession of polished performances, including the one that earned her a best-actress Oscar nomination, as the frustrated wife,
